alert.note: Alert for West Central Mountains; West Central Plateau (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 16 at 2:21PM MST until February 17 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 1 and 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...West Central Mountains and West Central Plateau. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on snow packed or icy road conditions. This includes portions of I-40 from the Arizona border across the Continental Divide. The hazardous conditions could impact evening and overnight commuters.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: West Central Mountains; West Central Plateau
